item.title: Working with Library Panels
item.description: Starting with version 0.4, library panels are going to be supported. It’s a bit special and the behavior is somewhat unique. Rules: Library Panels are immutable. They cannot be moved to a different folder. They are linked to one or multiple dashboards. The only way I can see to move a lib element is to unlink the panel, delete the panel and re-create it in a different folder, then re-link it.
